commit message:

Avoid leaking a XMPP Ping Server Thread

rename : src/org/jivesoftware/smackx/PingManager.java => src/org/jivesoftware/smackx/ping/PingManager.java
Fix NPE when setting the ping interval and there is no task thread.
Set the ping interval on creation
PingTask, multiple tries to avoid false positives
Fix exception when pingInterval = -1, sleep failed
Added debug log message to pingFailedListener
Added License Header for Smack PingManager
PingManager: notify ping failed listeners on failure on error of pingMyServer()

Fixed NPE in SmackAndroid usage
BackupManager: minor changes
